line.comment: * We create a special array to handle explorer sync, for performance purposes. See Mayhem.GetExplorers.
* Zero Hour: hard difficulty allows Explorers to claim empty sectors
* Zero Hour: hard difficulty allows Explorers to claim empty sectors
* we only do it in the beginning to snatch all the initial empty sectors. This is not supposed to be annoying all the way into the lategame
* skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsClaimable' : sector=$sector race=[OWNER]
* skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.IsBorderWith' : sector=$sector withRace=[OWNER]
* If the sector was empty, or Unknown, it's best to stay in the area for a while.
* For the AI, we manage sector blacklist here.
* already handled by Zero Hour Core AI update
* Don't put a satellite if we already have one.
* Synchronization with other explorers (same homebase only).
* START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox': text=$t icon=29 timeout=0 fadeout=0

sval.val: No satellite at homebase or Outpost
We create a special array to handle explorer sync, for performance purposes. See Mayhem.GetExplorers.
Zero Hour: hard difficulty allows Explorers to claim empty sectors
Zero Hour: hard difficulty allows Explorers to claim empty sectors
we only do it in the beginning to snatch all the initial empty sectors. This is not supposed to be annoying all the way into the lategame
skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Mayhem.IsClaimable' : sector=$sector race=[OWNER]
skip if [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.IsBorderWith' : sector=$sector withRace=[OWNER]
If the sector was empty, or Unknown, it's best to stay in the area for a while.
For the AI, we manage sector blacklist here.
already handled by Zero Hour Core AI update
Don't put a satellite if we already have one.
Synchronization with other explorers (same homebase only).
START [NULL]-> call script 'Joubarbe.Lib.Infobox': text=$t icon=29 timeout=0 fadeout=0
